nodes.text: Willus was a member of the Believers during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Willus was a member of a group of Believers who were sent to place some transmitters on fault lines on the surface of the planet Caarimon, as part of a plot to release a virus on the planet. Willus attacked the Heroes of Cularin, who were investigating the plot, and was defeated by them.

Willus appeared in Belly of the Beaast and his/her sex was not identified. The number of Believers that attack the Heroes of Cularin with Willus can vary with player tier of the player characters. For lower-tier players, Willus is accompanied by the Believer Urna. For middle-tier players, Willus is accompanied by Urna and Imber; and for higher-tier players, Willus is accompanied by Urna, Imber and Garit.
